channel.title: Cant log on it always says the server is down and i have tried many servers
channel.description: every time i try to log on it always says that there is an error or the server must be down. i even tried to look up servers that were online and they didnt work either :mad: :mad: can someone please help me? i have been trying to do this for hours and now i am getting mad. :mad:[code=c_mac][/code]

item.title: Cant log on it always says the server is down and i have tried many servers
item.dc:creator: @dc_chemicals dc_chemicals
item.description:
@dc_chemicals wrote:

This is not spam u noob this is a help forum and there askign for help.

All i can say to you two guys is if it keeps happening dont use the web client actually download mopar and You need a source to and you Probably could be typing it rong or having a space at the end. Or you should enter a port to maybe that will help and if you gte lost connection from a server and it wont let you on any restart your server again. And then see if it works.
